entry.title: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH, Chatham-Kent
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:06 p.m. EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING ENDED, Chatham-Kent
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 1:07 p.m. EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Showers ending this afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm early this afternoon. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High 10. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 late this evening then light overnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Sunny. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the afternoon. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
